name: A Simple Platformer Episode 1 - 4
description:
Hi, this is a game that I had been working on in my spare time

It is mainly a platforming game but with elements from other genre as well

An off beat game where players go through simulations after simulations that is projected by something that may or may not have mental issues

The controls is designed to be immediate and easy to pick up and play

There is joystick support

Do buy it to support the game
